task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 353°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full vertical extent of the main building (base to roofline), so I should tilt the camera upward while keeping the current heading to capture the top.
The roofline still isn’t fully framed, so I should pitch further up to capture the top edge for a height estimate.
I have enough view of the building’s upper portion now, and based on an apparent ~3-story facade (≈3.5 m per story plus roof/parapet) the total height is about 12 m.
